parameters.query:
SELECT DISTINCT ON (LOWER(hw_sku)) 
  '{{ $json.ip_address }}' AS ip_address,
  hw_sku,
  port_layout,
  chip_name,
  buffer_size,
  panel_base_image_url,
  panel_port_map_json
FROM device_layout_info
WHERE LOWER(hw_sku) ILIKE '%' || LOWER('{{ $json["hw_sku"] }}') || '%'
LIMIT 1;

parameters.jsonBody:
={
    "ip": "{{ $json.ip_address }}",
    "username": "{{ $json.username }}",
    "password": "{{ $json.password }}",
    "commands": [
        "show interfaces counters",
        "show ip bgp neighbors",
        "show ip bgp summary",
        "show ip bgp network",
        "show ip route",
        "show queue counters --json",
        "show mac",
        "show mac aging-time",
        "show vlan brief",
        "show arp",
        "show interfaces status",
        "ps -eo pid,comm,pcpu,pmem,etime,state --sort=-pcpu | head -n 20",
        "df -hT / /host /var/log",
        "lsblk -o NAME,SIZE,MODEL,ROTA,MOUNTPOINT",
        "cat /sys/block/sda/stat"
    ]
  }

={
    "ip": "{{ $json.ip_address }}",
    "username": "{{ $json.username }}",
    "password": "{{ $json.password }}",
    "commands": [
        "show platform temperature",
        "show platform fan",
        "show platform summary",
        "show platform psu"
    ]
  }
